constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 172 (Friday, October 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. STEEL:
H.R. 5468.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 7 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution
[Page H5593]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 9317 Bolsa Avenue, in Westminster, California, as the "General Tran Hung Dao Post Office".
